website_summaries.verdict: The Joybee GP2 makes a good case for itself if you need a projector that's affordable, has a good mind for business and is acceptable for casual use.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect delivery, and match as per my requierement, and perfect packaging. And Good quality and looks very nice plastic color. Very useful project to use in my customers presentations
customer_reviews.author: Nicanor

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector
customer_reviews.text: Everything is O.K. with this projector but I dont like these two facts: 1> It has an ultra wide-angle lens: You need to install this projector very near the screen ! 2>It does not accept "*.MPG" format films so I needed to convert all the films in my pendrive I used with the first model "(the GP1") !
customer_reviews.author: Dr Arbiser Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Bright, small, light!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The projector is very small and very bright. Its bright enough to project it in a room where some light slips in. It does not have to be completely dark. Its small but it does everything it promises!!! This is a great projector!! Its more expensive than other units out there but its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mijangos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, the ease of use, the lumens, almost everything about it. I'm not an Apple person - I have one iPod touch, and that's it. However, the connections and the ease of use make this a great micro-projector!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sixbey

customer_reviews.title: mUY BUENO
customer_reviews.text: ES JUSTO LO QEU ESPERABA ES UN DISEÑO ESPECTACULAR Y FUNCIONA PERFECTAMENTE .. LO RECOMIENDO. . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Ana Virguez

customer_reviews.title: We like it for business
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for MacBook Pro for presentations, the HDMI connector works well with the Mac but the USB streaming is not possible with the Mac. We chose to load up a 16 GB card to keep in the unit itself and together with the optional battery pack we have a great compact presentation device. The light levels are good enough for most applications and the speaker sounds pretty good for a little dinky one.
customer_reviews.author: royenviro

customer_reviews.title: Unable to enjoy due to sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Upon first use extraordinarily poor sound quality with loud static noise drowning out all music and dialogue. I sent the projector back to China (as advised) for $58 in postage. I will repost if this is resolved with a new projector as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Raether

customer_reviews.title: Display is not very bright
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this projector the same day I received it. With all the lights turned off in my office, you could hardly see the display on the screen. The brightness controls were set to the brightest setting. I'm really surprised that this poor quality of equipment came from BenQ. I didn't get the optional battery pack and that's a good thing because it will cut the amount of lumens in half making it even less bright.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: 200 ansi. I want upgrade bright
customer_reviews.text: 200 ansi, some more than brighting. use dark room or night time. cooling system some noise and more hot. touch pad short delays.
customer_reviews.author: Jaekwang Kim

customer_reviews.title: It DOES NOT work with iPAD
customer_reviews.text: This is what I have been told by the Benq headoffice. I spent Rs 15000 ($300) extra just because it was advertised as such on Amazon and EBay (that it works with iPad) and I found out after buying two Apple AV adapters on Benq engineer's insistence (as even he was unaware). Later on the engineer enquired with Benq India HQ, and was told that GP2 does't work with iPad. I wonder how many people around are being fooled with this misinformation. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: aanand

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for small-medium rooms
customer_reviews.text: Amazing projector if you're not planning to use it at a church or other big venue. Bright colors, great hd image, and gives you a bigger picture from close range compared to other high-end projectors.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: the worst projector ever
customer_reviews.text: i hate this product because it doesnt come with a free puppy like it says so in the review. and the quality is very poor. ASPARAGUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: tv

product_meta.title: Joybee GP2 iPhone/iPod/iPad Projector
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER




THE BENQ JOYBEE GP2 MINI PROJECTOR
Meet the Joybee GP2 – BenQ’s second-generation LED mini projector!
Styled with the signature black and white design, this palm-sized device leads the category with a number of upgraded features, including an all-in-one iPhone/iPod-compatible dock, an optional battery pack, short-throw projection, unparalleled multimedia connectivity, and two 2W stereo speakers. A truly incredible mobile entertainer, the Joybee GP2 brings you up close and personal audiovisual enjoyment no matter where you go! Enjoyment matters!

Ultra-portable projector for mobile entertainment or those meetings on-the-go. Click to enlarge. 


Take it anywhere at just 1.2 lbs! 



AN ULTRA PORTABLE ENTERTAINMENT STATION
Fits in the Palm of Your Hand!
Plug your Apple iPhone or iPod into the iPhone/iPod-compatible dock to share videos, photos, and games with family and friends via a big screen up to 160-inches in size! Just make sure your iPhone or iPod application supports TV-Out. Plus, this multifunctional dock is uniquely designed to simultaneously charge up your Apple device, so you’ll never run out of fun. The GP2 also supports other smartphones, tablets and media players.

Compact and Stylish Design
Light and compact at a mere 565g (without battery), the sleek and stylish GP2 is perfect to carry around town – whether it’s for house parties, camping expeditions or for traveling abroad.

Detachable Battery for Total Portability
When running at 100 ANSI lumen brightness on a fully charged battery, the GP2 can give you three hours of mobile cinema fun.

4W Integrated Audio Power
Travel light and enjoy great sounds with the GP2! This mini projector is packed with two quality built-in 2W speakers, so you can leave your speakers at home.

Music Playback in Standby Mode 
The GP2 is also your personal speaker system. Simply have the device in the Standby mode to listen to your favorite tunes day in and day out!


The ultimate in multimedia connectivity




MULTIMEDIA CONNECTIVITY
The GP2 Supports Just About Anything
The GP2 connects to your everyday home entertainment and personal media devices with a simple plug ‘n play!

USB Display
With the GP2, you won’t need a D-sub cable! Connect it to your computer using a USB cable instead.

USB File Transfer 
Transfer your multimedia files to the 2GB internal storage to travel light.


Share Here, There and Everywhere. 




PICTURE PERFORMANCE TO ENLIGHTEN YOU
Big Beautiful Projection from a Mini Projector
Powered by BenQ’s 3LED projection technology, the GP2 utilizes RGB LEDs as the light source to bring you crisp, clear cinematic picture quality with optimized brightness, contrast ratio, native resolution, and NTSC color gamut. Now you can enjoy up to 160-inches of big-picture entertainment wherever you go!

HD-Ready with a 720p Resolution
Enjoy your favorite movies, sports games and TV programs in high definition! The second-generation mini projector comes HD-ready to upgrade your viewing experience.

44-Inches at a Short Distance
The GP2 is not only highly mobile but also incredibly flexible with a 1.13 short-throw ratio. You simply don’t need that much room when all you need is one meter to project a big picture.

Delightful Colors and Contrast 
Boasting a high contrast ratio of 2400:1 and 200 ANSI lumen brightness, the GP2 gives you ultra-refined color definition with sharper text.

Brilliance that Lasts Through Time
Thanks to the 3LED technology, this mini projector can project for 30,000 hours without decrease in brightness when in the Eco Mode. That’s more than ten years of big-screen entertainment – if you use it for eight hours a day! Together with its durable, filter-free DLP engine design, the GP2 is energy efficient and practically effortless to maintain!


Touch-sensitive control panel. 




DESIGN THAT PUTS YOU FIRST
The GP2 provides you with a friendly user experience like no other!
Unlike traditional projectors, it is styled with a user interface that brings together navigation elements from popular multimedia devices that you are already familiar with, and thoughtful features to keep up with your on-the-go lifestyle.

Touch-Sensitive Control Panel
Unlike traditional projectors, the GP2 allows you to bring up an intuitively-designed user interface with a single touch!

Multimedia Support
The GP2 supports a variety of multimedia formats ranging from videos, photos, and music to MS office and PDF documents.

Instant On/Off
Wait no more! The instant on/off feature helps turn the GP2 on and power it down in only a few seconds.

Stylized Ventilation
The ventilation is stylized with circles to create a lively and fun look, while keeping the GP2 nice and cool.

Auto keystone
The automatic keystone adjustment helps turn misshaped images, graphics and charts into a perfect square.


“Made for iPod,” and “Made for iPhone,” mean that an electronic accessory has been designed to connect specifically to iPod and iPhone respectively, and has been certified by the developer to meet Apple performance standards. Apple is not responsible for the operation of this device or its compliance with safety and regulatory standards. Please note that the use of this accessory with iPod and iPhone may affect wireless performance.

© 2011 BenQ Corporation. All rights reserved. Apple, the Apple logo, iPad, iPhone, iPod, iPod classic, iPod nano, iPod shuffle, and iPod touch are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
feature_bullets: All-in-one iPhone/iPod dock, Mini HDMI port for iPad, USB & Streaming USB connections
HD/WXGA (1280x800) Native Resolution, Full HD Ready
Bright 200 LED powered ANSI Lumens with 2400:1 Contrast Ratio
LED Light Source, up to 30,000 lamp hours
